about_the_game:
After 10 years of sleep, Dr. Green wakes up in cryoprison on an Earth colony overrun by Mutants (former humans). Green has a past to atone for, but he also must find his estranged daughter Anna. On his way through the ravaged planet, he will be faced with intense combat, encounter survivors, and feel the wind of adventure. Will this story have a happy ending?
...
Mutant Gate is written on its own hybrid tile/ASCII engine, its 4-hour campaign featuring a multitude of scripted sequences within 2D, Doom-style levels. There's also an option for pure ASCII visuals. The game auto-detects Steam Deck and supports its controls.

content_descriptors.notes: ASCII blood effects depicted with red ASCII characters. Implied mass-consumption of fictional medical drug which was supposed to heal, but had an unforeseen side effect which converted people into zombie-like monsters and created apocalypse.

short_description: After years in cryoprison, Dr. Green awakens on a mutant-infested Earth colony. Seeking redemption and his estranged daughter Anna, he battles through a ravaged planet in a 4-hour campaign of intense combat, encounters, and adventure. Mutant Gate has hybrid tile/ASCII visuals & Steam Deck support.
